# MailScoutVerify - Email Finding & Verification 
 
Find and verify email addresses accurately, ensuring authenticity and reliability for seamless communication

[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MailScoutVerify/blob/main/LICENSE)
[![Info](https://img.shields.io/badge/Project-Info-blue?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MailScoutVerify)
[![GitHub latest commit](https://badgen.net/github/last-commit/UjjwalSaini07/MailScoutVerify)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MailScoutVerify)
[![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Owner-@Ujjwal-<COLOR>.svg)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07)
[![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/UjjwalSaini07/MailScoutVerify?style=social&label=Star&maxAge=2592100)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MailScoutVerify)

## Features üéØ

- üì® Email Finding: Helps in finding email addresses.
  - üß≠ Locate emails across various domains.
- ‚úÖ Email Verification: Ensures the authenticity and reliability of email addresses.
  - üóÇÔ∏è Categorize emails (personal, business, educational, disposable, others)
  - üîí Check against blacklisted domains
- ‚ö° Efficiency: Improves communication by ensuring valid contact details.
- üîí Security: Verifies emails to prevent fake addresses.

## Installation üõ†Ô∏è

Install the package using npm:

```bash
npm install mailscoutverify
```

## Usage üñ•Ô∏è

### Usage

1. **For Email Verification**
```javascript
import { EmailVerification } from "mailscoutverify";

const testEmail = "fake@tempmail.com";
EmailVerification(testEmail);
```
2. **For Email Finder - FullName**
```javascript
import { findEmailByFullNameHandle } from "mailscoutverify";

const domain = 'microsoft.com';
const fullName = 'Satya Nadella';
findEmailByFullNameHandle(domain, fullName);
```
3. **For Email Finder - First\Last Name**
```javascript
import { findEmailByNameHandle } from "mailscoutverify";

const domain = 'google.com';
const firstName = 'Sundar';
const lastName = 'Pichai';
findEmailByNameHandle(domain, firstName, lastName);
```

## Examples üìù

### Verifying a valid email

```javascript
import { EmailVerification } from "mailscoutverify";

const testEmail = "fake@tempmail.com";
EmailVerification(testEmail);
// Output: Passed: Verification Result for user1@gmail.com: { isValid: true, category: 'personal' }
```

### Verifying an invalid email

```javascript
import { EmailVerification } from "mailscoutverify";

const testEmail = "fake@tempmail.com";
EmailVerification(testEmail);
// Output: Failed: Verification Result for fake@tempmail.com: { isValid: false, category: 'unknown', reason: 'Blacklisted domain' }
```

### Finding Email By FullName

```javascript
import { findEmailByFullNameHandle } from "mailscoutverify";

const domain = 'microsoft.com';
const fullName = 'Satya Nadella';
findEmailByFullNameHandle(domain, fullName);
/* Output:
{
  "input": {
    "company_name": null,
    "country_code": null,
    "domain": "microsoft.com",
    "first_name": null,
    "full_name": "Satya Nadella",
    "last_name": null
  },
  "results": {
    "alternatives": [
      "satyanad@microsoft.com"
    ],
    "email": "satyanadella@microsoft.com",
    "validation": "valid"
  },
  "success": true
}*/

```

### Finding Email By First/Last Name

```javascript
import { findEmailByNameHandle } from "mailscoutverify";

const domain = 'google.com';
const firstName = 'Sundar';
const lastName = 'Pichai';
findEmailByNameHandle(domain, firstName, lastName);
/* Output:
{
  "input": {
    "company_name": null,
    "country_code": null,
    "domain": "google.com",
    "first_name": Sundar,
    "full_name": "null",
    "last_name": Pichai
  },
  "results": {
    "alternatives": [
      ""
    ],
    "email": "sundarpichai@google.com",
    "validation": "valid"
  },
  "success": true
}*/
```
